                                         java.lang.Integer fieldID,
                                         java.util.Locale locale,
                                         int indexStart)
        Replaces the label for a field with the objectID value
        Parameters:
        analyzer -
        toBeProcessedString - a part of the user entered query string
        workItemFieldName - the workItem field name (like CRM Contact)
        luceneFieldName - the name of the user entered lucene field (like Company from CRM Contact)
        indexStart - the index to start looking for fieldName
        Returns:
